localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Supabase is an open source Firebase alternative. Today we are launching one of our most requested features - Storage! You can upload files, programmatically or via the dashboard, and make them available in your Supabase app.
blogPost.body: Supabase is an open source Firebase alternative. Today we are launching one of our most requested features - Storage! You can upload files, programmatically or via the dashboard, and make them available in your Supabase app.
blogPost.title: Supabase Storage - Store and serve any type of digital content
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Supabase是一个开源的Firebase替代品。今天，我们推出了我们最受欢迎的功能之一--存储。您可以通过编程或通过仪表板上传文件，并在您的Supabase应用程序中提供它们。
localize.tagline: 存储和提供任何类型的数字内容

localize.description: Supabase是一個開源的Firebase替代品。今天，我們推出了我們最受歡迎的功能之一--存儲。您可以通過編程或通過儀表板上傳文件，並在您的Supabase應用程序中提供它們。
localize.tagline: 存儲和提供任何類型的數字內容

previous.title:
Lumber prices hit another record high, more than tripling over the last year.

According to the Fed, there's no evidence of inflation, and easy money policies must continue for a few more years. https://t.co/zhgO2WCmkq

localize.full_text:
木材价格再创历史新高，比去年翻了三倍多。

美联储认为，没有证据表明存在通货膨胀，宽松货币政策必须再持续几年。https://t.co/zhgO2WCmkq。

木材價格再創歷史新高，比去年翻了三倍多。

美聯儲認爲，沒有證據表明存在通貨膨脹，寬鬆貨幣政策必須再持續幾年。https://t.co/zhgO2WCmkq。

next.excerpt: Hey! We're an Australian start up that's just released BodyGuide. It's an app that helps you self solve aches, pains and tension. There's no payment details for the promo so you don't have to cancel. Fix your neck, back, shoulder, knee & hip pain - for free.
next.title: BodyGuide - The app that helps you self-solve aches, pain and tension

localize.description: 嘿！我们是一家澳大利亚的创业公司，刚刚发布了BodyGuide。这是一款帮助你自我解决疼痛和紧张的应用。促销活动没有支付细节，所以你不必取消。修复你的颈部、背部、肩部、膝盖和臀部疼痛--免费。
localize.tagline: 这款应用程序可以帮助你自我解决疼痛，疼痛和紧张。

localize.description: 嘿！我們是一家澳大利亞的創業公司，剛剛發佈了BodyGuide。這是一款幫助你自我解決疼痛和緊張的應用。促銷活動沒有支付細節，所以你不必取消。修復你的頸部、背部、肩部、膝蓋和臀部疼痛--免費。
localize.tagline: 這款應用程序可以幫助你自我解決疼痛，疼痛和緊張。
